plot outline: The main character Kartik has attraction to forest and animals since he listened to stories of forest, animal, hills etc. from his father. He often acts like animals he sees! Never loved by mother and his dad committed suicide when he was child because his mothers relation with anyother. Though he gets a girls company with help of his friend, he was freaked out with that girls attitude and later he finds his real love with a common indian movie's incident.
title: 18 Vayasu
